attributes.action: Look into NHS procurement and executive salaries
attributes.additional_details: The NHS is a lifeline. It's funded appropriately yet money is wasted left, right and centre. Someone needs to review this and be accountable
attributes.background: Review the procurement policies and protocol of the NHS and review salaries and benefits offered to executive officers. NHS paying over inflated prices for medication, equipment and services. Are executive officers worthy of a 6 figure salary and why aren't they more accountable?

rejection.details:
NHS pay points are a matter for the NHS Pay Review Body and the relevant trade unions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition instead: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073
